responsibilities.responsibility: Identified bottleneck in MFG engineering workflow where labels are fitted onto ply shapes by hand, created polygon nesting script to automate label placement, integrated script into shop’s production software stack saving hours on each build package
Designed first production composite tool, pioneering company goal of in-house composite tooling
